name: Santa Escape
description:
**************

Minimun Requirements : Amiga 500 512kb+512kb.

Coded in Amos Professional with Amcaf extension for Music & Sfx.

Using Amal Scripts for smooth 50hz in Stock A500 7.14mhz

16 Colours plus 16 colours in copper background ,for a total of 32 Colours.

Intro Loading Screen 16 colours made in Dpaint IV pixel by pixel by Johnny Acevedo.

Game characters sprite assets taking from internet and converted to Amiga Iff.

This is a mini game created for teaching purposes in Amiten Labs Amos Course 2019.

Source Code included.

Note:

Toxic Amiga Community Members : stop critiquize others and more creations!.
